questions.text: Which of the following transports are hormone-regulated?

options.text: Na+ reabsorption in the thick ascending segment - vasopressin
K+ secretion in the collecting duct - aldosterone
Na+ reabsorption in the proximal tubule - aldosterone
Na+ reabsorption in the collecting duct - ANH
Ca2+ reabsorption in the distal tubule - PTH
K+ reabsorption in the distal tubule - aldosterone
